messages.subject: Re: record keeping
messages.msgSnippet: I finally quit worrying about other people s reactions.  I have been known to simply ask Do the kids seem stupid, dull-witted or somehow
messages.messageBody:
<<Any suggestions?>>

I finally quit worrying about other people's reactions. I have been known
to simply ask "Do the kids seem stupid, dull-witted or somehow backward to
you?" And since the response is always "No, they are really bright kids", I
then ask "So.....what's your point?" with a big grin.

Julie
